channel.title: SB508 walking queue messed up when adding manually
channel.description:
For my firemaking system, I try to manually add one coordinate to the west to the walking queue, so that he walks west after lighting the fire. But for some reason, when I try to add the coordinates (p.absX - 1, p.absY), he moves to these coordinates (p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1).
Here is the line controlling it: [code]Engine.playerMovement.addStepToWalkingQueue(p.absX - 1, p.absY, p);[/code]

item.title: SB508 walking queue messed up when adding manually
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Yes, he still moves northeast.

Read full topic
